name: VULTURE

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The vulture has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Beak
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 2 (1d4) Piercing damage.

raw_text:
AC 10 	Initiative +0 (10)
HP 5 (1d8 + 1)
Speed 10 ft., Fly 50 ft.
Medium Beast, Unaligned

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/Monster Manual/Animals - Monster Manual - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf
